channel.title: [pi] rules interface
channel.description: Can anyone point me in the right direction on how to make an interface that has my server's rules on it and to play you have to accept it? Like when they first start.

item.title: [pi] rules interface
item.dc:creator: @sombohdi sombohdi
item.description:
@sombohdi wrote:

Alright first got to your server, and search for “player assistant” then open up the folder and search for “starter” and then connect to the mainframe, and add the coding to display the rules. You should be done by then, I hope this tutorial helped.

Read full topic
